Translations.Text: ileyhi yuraddu `ilmu-ssa`ah. vema tahrucu min semeratim min ekmamiha vema tahmilu min unsa vela teda`u illa bi`ilmih. veyevme yunadihim eyne surakai kalu azennake ma minna min sehid
vedalle `anhum ma kanu yed`une min kablu vezannu ma lehum mim mehis
la yes'emu-l'insanu min du`ai-lhayr. veim messehu-sserru feyeusun kanut

velein ezaknahu rahmetem minna mim ba`di darrae messethu leyekulenne haza li vema ezunnu-ssa`ate kaimetev veleir ruci`tu ila rabbi inne li `indehu lelhusna. felenunebbienne-llezine keferu bima `amilu. velenuzikannehum min `azabin galiz
veiza en`amna `ale-l'insani a`rada venea bicanibih. veiza messehu-sserru fezu du`ain `arid
kul era'eytum in kane min `indi-llahi summe kefertum bihi men edallu mimmen huve fi sikakim be`id
senurihim ayatina fi-l'afaki vefi enfusihim hatta yetebeyyene lehum ennehu-lhakk. evelem yekfi birabbike ennehu `ala kulli sey'in sehid
ela innehum fi miryetim mil likai rabbihim. ela innehu bikulli sey'im muhit
ha-mim
ayn-sin-kaf
kezalike yuhi ileyke veile-llezine min kablike-llahu-l`azizu-lhakim
lehu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. vehuve-l`aliyyu-l`azim
tekadu-ssemavatu yetefettarne min fevkihinne velmelaiketu yusebbihune bihamdi rabbihim veyestagfirune limen fi-l'ard. ela inne-llahe huve-lgafuru-rrahim
vellezine-ttehazu min dunihi evliyae-llahu hafizun `aleyhim. vema ente `aleyhim bivekil
vekezalike evhayna ileyke kur'anen `arabiyyel litunzira umme-lkura vemen havleha vetunzira yevme-lcem`i la raybe fih. ferikun fi-lcenneti veferikun fi-sse`ir
velev sae-llahu lece`alehum ummetev vahidetev velakiy yudhilu mey yesau fi rahmetih. vezzalimune ma lehum miv veliyyiv vela nesir
emi-ttehazu min dunihi evliya'. fellahu huve-lveliyyu vehuve yuhyi-lmevta. vehuve `ala kulli sey'in kadir
veme-hteleftum fihi min sey'in fehukmuhu ile-llah. zalikumu-llahu rabbi `aleyhi tevekkelt. veileyhi unib
fatiru-ssemavati vel'ard. ce`ale lekum min enfusikum ezvacev vemine-l'en`ami ezvaca. yezraukum fih. leyse kemislihi sey'. vehuve-ssemi`u-lbesir
lehu mekalidu-ssemavati vel'ard. yebsutu-rrizka limey yesau veyakdir. innehu bikulli sey'in `alim

sera`a lekum mine-ddini ma vessa bihi nuhav vellezi evhayna ileyke vema vessayna bihi ibrahime vemusa ve`isa en ekimu-ddine vela teteferraku fih. kebura `ale-lmusrikine ma ted`uhum ileyh. allahu yectebi ileyhi mey yesau veyehdi ileyhi mey yunib

vema teferraku illa mim ba`di ma caehumu-l`ilmu bagyem beynehum. velevla kelimetun sebekat mir rabbike ila ecelim musemmel lekudiye beynehum. veinne-llezine urisu-lkitabe mim ba`dihim lefi sekkim minhu muribun

felizalike fed`u. vestekim kema umirt. vela tettebi` ehvaehum. vekul amentu bima enzele-llahu min kitab. veumirtu lia`dile beynekum. allahu rabbuna verabbukum. lena a`maluna velekum a`malukum. la huccete beynena vebeynekum. allahu yecme`u beynena. veileyhi-lmesir
vellezine yuhaccune fi-llahi mim ba`di me-stucibe lehu huccetuhum dahidatun `inde rabbihim ve`aleyhim gadabuv velehum `azabun sedid
allahu-llezi enzele-lkitabe bilhakki velmizan. vema yudrike le`alle-ssa`ate karib
yesta`cilu bihe-llezine la yu'minune biha. vellezine amenu musfikune minha veya`lemune ennehe-lhakk. ela inne-llezine yumarune fi-ssa`ati lefi dalalim be`id
allahu letifum bi`ibadihi yerzuku mey yesa'. vehuve-lkaviyyu-l`aziz
men kane yuridu harse-l'ahirati nezid lehu fi harsih. vemen kane yuridu harse-ddunya nu'tihi minha vema lehu fi-l'ahirati min nesib
em lehum surakau sera`u lehum mine-ddini ma lem ye'zem bihi-llah. velevla kelimetu-lfasli lekudiye beynehum. veinne-zzalimine lehum `azabun elim
tera-zzalimine musfikine mimma kesebu vehuve vaki`um bihim. vellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati fi ravdati-lcennat. lehum ma yesaune `inde rabbihim. zalike huve-lfadlu-lkebir

zalike-llezi yubessiru-llahu `ibadehu-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati. kul la es'elukum `aleyhi ecran ille-lmeveddete fi-lkurba. vemey yakterif haseneten nezid lehu fiha husna. inne-llahe gafurun sekur
em yekulune-ftera `ale-llahi keziba. feiy yesei-llahu yahtim `ala kalbik. veyemhu-llahu-lbatile veyuhikku-lhakka bikelimatih. innehu `alimum bizati-ssudur
vehuve-llezi yakbelu-ttevbete `an `ibadihi veya`fu `ani-sseyyiati veya`lemu ma tef`alun
veyestecibu-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati veyeziduhum min fadlih. velkafirune lehum `azabun sedid
velev beseta-llahu-rrizka li`ibadihi lebegav fi-l'ardi velakiy yunezzilu bikaderim ma yesa'. innehu bi`ibadihi habirum besir
vehuve-llezi yunezzilu-lgayse mim ba`di ma kanetu veyensuru rahmeteh. vehuve-lveliyyu-lhamid
vemin ayatihi halku-ssemavati vel'ardi vema besse fihima min dabbeh. vehuve `ala cem`ihim iza yesau kadir
vema esabekum mim musibetin febima kesebet eydikum veya`fu `an kesir
vema entum bimu`cizine fi-l'ard. vema lekum min duni-llahi miv veliyyiv vela nesir
vemin ayatihi-lcevari fi-lbahri kel'a`lam
iy yese' yuskini-rriha feyazlelne ravakide `ala zahrih. inne fi zalike leayatil likulli sabbarin sekur
ev yubikhunne bima kesebu veya`fu `an kesir
veya`leme-llezine yucadilune fi ayatina. ma lehum mim mehis
fema utitum min sey'in femeta`u-lhayati-ddunya. vema `inde-llahi hayruv veebka lillezine amenu ve`ala rabbihim yetevekkelun
vellezine yectenibune kebaira-l'ismi velfevahise veiza ma gadibu hum yagfirun
vellezine-stecabu lirabbihim veekamu-ssalah. veemruhum sura beynehum. vemimma razaknahum yunfikun
vellezine iza esabehumu-lbagyu hum yentesirun
vecezau seyyietin seyyietum misluha. femen `afa veasleha feecruhu `ale-llah. innehu la yuhibbu-zzalimin
velemeni-ntesara ba`de zulmihi feulaike ma `aleyhim min sebil
inneme-ssebilu `ale-llezine yazlimune-nnase veyebgune fi-l'ardi bigayri-lhakk. ulaike lehum `azabun elim
velemen sabera vegafera inne zalike lemin `azmi-l'umur
vemey yudlili-llahu fema lehu miv veliyyim mim ba`dih. vetera-zzalimine lemma raevu-l`azabe yekulune hel ila meraddim min sebil

veterahum yu`radune `aleyha hasi`ine mine-zzulli yenzurune min tarfin hafiyy. vekale-llezine amenu inne-lhasirine-llezine hasiru enfusehum veehlihim yevme-lkiyameh. ela inne-zzalimine fi `azabim mukim
vema kane lehum min evliyae yensurunehum min duni-llah. vemey yudlili-llahu fema lehu min sebil
istecibu lirabbikum min kabli ey ye'tiye yevmul la meradde lehu mine-llah. ma lekum mim melceiy yevmeiziv vema lekum min nekir
fein a`radu fema erselnake `aleyhim hafiza. in `aleyke ille-lbelag. veinna iza ezakne-l'insane minna rahmeten feriha biha. vein tusibhum seyyietum bima kaddemet eydihim feinne-l'insane kefur
lillahi mulku-ssemavati vel'ard. yahluku ma yesa'. yehebu limey yesau inasev veyehebu limey yesau-zzukura
ev yuzevvicuhum zukranev veinasa. veyec`alu mey yesau `akima. innehu `alimun kadir
vema kane libeserin ey yukellimehu-llahu illa vahyen ev miv verai hicabin ev yursile rasulen feyuhiye biiznihi ma yesa'. innehu `aliyyun hakim
vekezalike evhayna ileyke ruham min emrina. ma kunte tedri me-lkitabu vele-l'imanu velakin ce`alnahu nuran nehdi bihi men nesau min `ibadina. veinneke letehdi ila siratim mustekim
sirati-llahi-llezi lehu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. ela ile-llahi tesiru-l'umur

vehaleka-llahu-ssemavati vel'arda bilhakki velitucza kullu nefsim bima kesebet vehum la yuzlemun
eferaeyte meni-ttehaze ilahehu hevahu veedallehu-llahu `ala `ilmiv vehateme `ala sem`ihi vekalbihi vece`ale `ala besarihi gisaveh. femey yehdihi mim ba`di-llah. efela tezekkerun
vekalu ma hiye illa hayatune-ddunya nemutu venahya vema yuhlikuna ille-ddehr. vema lehum bizalike min `ilmin. in hum illa yezunnun
veiza tutla `aleyhim ayatuna beyyinatim ma kane huccetehum illa en kalu-'tu biabaina in kuntum sadikin
kuli-llahu yuhyikum summe yumitukum summe yecme`ukum ila yevmi-lkiyameti la raybe fihi velakinne eksera-nnasi la ya`lemun
velillahi mulku-ssemavati vel'ard. veyevme tekumu-ssa`atu yevmeiziy yahseru-lmubtilun
vetera kulle ummetin casiyeh. kullu ummetin tud`a ila kitabiha. elyevme tuczevne ma kuntum ta`melun
haza kitabuna yentiku `aleykum bilhakk. inna kunna nestensihu ma kuntum ta`melun
feemme-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati feyudhiluhum rabbuhum fi rahmetih. zalike huve-lfevzu-lmubin
veemme-llezine keferu. efelem tekun ayati tutla `aleykum festekbertum vekuntum kavmem mucrimin
veiza kile inne va`de-llahi hakkuv vessa`atu la raybe fiha kultum ma nedri me-ssa`atu in nezunnu illa zanna vema nahnu bimusteykinin
vebeda lehum seyyietu ma `amilu vehaka bihim ma kanu bihi yestehziun
vekile-lyevme nensakum kema nesitum likae yevmikum haza veme'vakum-nnaru vema lekum min nasirin
zalikum biennekumu-ttehaztum ayati-llahi huzuvev vegarratkumu-lhayatu-ddunya. felyevme la yuhracune minha vela hum yusta`tebun
felillahi-lhamdu rabbi-ssemavati verabbi-l'ardi rabbi-l`alemin
velehu-lkibriyau fi-ssemavati vel'ard. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim
